text: Now, when all these things shall become upon thee, the blessing or the curse, which I have set forth before thee, and thou shalt be touched with repentance of thy heart among all the nations into which the Lord thy God shall have scattered thee."

segments.text: Now, when all these things shall become upon thee, the blessing or the curse, which I have
set forth before thee, and thou shalt be touched with repentance of thy heart among all the
nations into which the Lord thy God shall have scattered thee."
